reviews.review: THIS MOVIE IS SPEECHLESS AMD BROKEN MY F*CKING HEART INTO MILLIONS OF PIECES!!!!!!!

This movie exceeded all my previous expectations. Each character shines when given their chance, leaving a sad overtone for each character that falls to Thanos. This villain is one of the best villains I have seen in any marvel movie or movie in general. As I said previously, this movie exceeded ALL my expectations.

One of the best, if not THE best superhero/comic book movies I have ever seen! The way they tied all of the characters together was amazing and so well done. As with pretty much every superhero movie, the protagonist wins in the end, but with Avengers: Infinity War, it was cool to see the villan win this time.

A V E N G E R S: I N F I N I T Y W A R is the nineteenth movie by the MCU (Marvel Cinematic Universe), and is the seventh movie from Phase 3. So without spoiling anything, I really liked it a lot. It was a really good movie. The acting is still really good, the directing by the Russo brothers is marvelous it really is. The action sequences were done very well, and the special/visual effects were great, sometimes I was able to notice that the CGI was not working well with some parts of the movie, but most of the time it worked well. Let’s talk about Thanos, he’s great as the villain. Not only is Josh Brolin great at playing Thanos, the characters itself is just perfect. I did have some problems with this movie, but I’m not going to talk about any of those issues so I don’t spoil the movie. What I will say is that this is definitely a movie people need to check out, and I’ll probably go see this movie again and again. But afterwards, Avengers: Infinity War was a really good movie that must be seen.
this movie was very insane, thanos is very scary, the movie made me really nervous and this is marvel studios best movie ever, i loved it so much
This movie was truly epic and I loved every minute of it, And wow that ending!
A love letter to the fans. Any film that can make me completely forget that I brought my prom date and how badly I had to use the bathroom is worth seeing again and again.

( warning, this review contains spoilers) Great fantastic phenomenal movie starring Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Tom Holland, and Chris pratt. This isn't your typical marvel film, it's an event. You would hate this movie if you've never seen the other 18 marvel movies. Their was so much death in this movie and it was amazing. Hype for avengers 4 and another secret movie that's the end credit scene of this film.

I feel like this could be a 5 star film but would need to see it again to know that. Either way this perfectly encapsulated the spirit and summed up 10 years of fantastic movies. Thanks is fantastic and it does feel each member gets there moment to shine. If i had to criticise it does feel that Thor is some sort of indestructible being now which i'm never a fan of, so hopefully they will show some fallibility in the sequel.
